mapper.select: SELECT A.AcuntId , A.UserType , B.PersnNm , (SELECT CompyNm FROM TB_Org WHERE OrgId = B.OrgId) as CompyNm , A.RegDt FROM TB_Acunt A INNER JOIN TB_Persn B on A.UserId = B.PersnId ORDER BY A.RegDt DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT A.CompyNm , B.AcuntId , B.RegDt FROM TB_Org A INNER JOIN TB_Acunt B ON A.OrgId = B.UserId WHERE B.UserType = 'C00101' LIMIT 5

SELECT A.AcuntId , A.UserType , B.PersnNm , (SELECT CompyNm FROM TB_Org WHERE OrgId = B.OrgId) as CompyNm , C.EndDt , C.TurnId , C.PayId FROM TB_Acunt A INNER JOIN TB_Persn B on A.UserId = B.PersnId INNER JOIN TB_AnsPrgrs C ON A.AcuntId = C.AcuntId WHERE C.DoneYn = 'Y' AND C.TurnId <> 0 ORDER BY C.EndDt DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.AcuntId , A.UserType , B.PersnNm , (SELECT CompyNm FROM TB_Org WHERE OrgId = B.OrgId) as CompyNm , C.EndDt , C.TurnId , C.PayId FROM TB_Acunt A inner join TB_Persn B on A.UserId = B.PersnId INNER JOIN TB_AnsPrgrs C ON A.AcuntId = C.AcuntId WHERE C.DoneYn = 'Y' AND C.TurnId = 0 ORDER BY C.EndDt DESC LIMIT 5
